column1: #The name for the Job, will store in folder with this name
column2: The path to monitor file changes
column3: The check interval for the script about content change.
column4: The Path to store the version history vault
column5: When vault is empty, copy entire monitorig path to vault instead of using links
column6: Do not backup file content upon attr change
column7: How many max versions of the file to keep in vault
column8: Keep purging old versions until 1 left if vault size exceed this limit

column1: #need to be unique for path distinction
column3: Will only backup upon X seconds of inactivity
column5: If true, can take long to initialize / fail to initialize if backup space is small
column6: If true, file attr change will get synced to the most recent file backup
column8: Maybe inaccurate on CoW File systems. Use 0 for infinity, % numbers refer to disk usage %
